## base58ToBytes() function

Converts a base58 string to the Uint8Array it represents.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function base58ToBytes(s: string): Uint8Array
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description                |
| --------- | ------ | -------------------------- |
| s         | string | the string to be converted |

<b>Returns:</b>

Uint8Array

## Exceptions

if the string is not formatted correctly.
